body.name: LIBREFLY Mini 1080P Hidden Spy Camera - WiFi Tiny USB Charger Camera, 140-Degree Wide Angle - Small Nanny Cam for Home Security
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Remote Live Viewing 】This wireless hidden camera, also known as a spy camera or nanny cam, is cleverly disguised as a USB charger camera. Once connected to the Wi-Fi network, users can remotely access live streaming video via an app, providing convenience and stealth for real-time surveillance from anywhere.

【High-Quality Video】Despite its tiny and unobtrusive size, this micro USB charger spy camera delivers high-resolution 1080P video. This mini hidden camera ensures that the captures are clear and detailed with a 140-degree wide-angle view, making it a small yet powerful tool for monitoring.

【Motion Detection Alerts & Push】This small and discreet hidden camera comes equipped with motion detection capabilities, promptly sending alerts to your device. It acts as an efficient wireless nanny cam, ensuring you're alerted to any activity in your home or office in real time.

【Versatile Video Modes for Every Need】The camera offers four different modes to suit various surveillance needs: continuous video, scheduled video, alarm video, and privacy mode. It's a versatile mini spy camera that provides flexibility and control over your preferences.

【Enhanced Local Storage and Reliable Connectivity】Supporting up to 256GB of local storage on a micro SD card (Not Included), this tiny USB charger camera ensures your data is safe and readily available. With its stable Wi-Fi connection and ability to record videos to the SD card even without Wi-Fi, this small camera promises consistent performance and reliability.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1. Message push: Enable this function, your phone will receive push notifications once this micro charger camera detects a motion. 2. Alarm video: This hidden spy camera will record a short video to the SD card once this micro charger camera detects a motion. 3. Snapshot: This wireless spy camera will take a photo to the App once this micro charger camera detects a motion.

1. Directly Inserted a Micro SD Card into this hidden camera charger, and plug this mini hidden camera into an outlet, then this spy camera charger will automatically record videos to the SD card. 2. Plug this hidden charger camera into an outlet, then enter your phone's WiFi settings and connect to this tiny spy camera's WiFi hotspot (AYS-XXX), then you can view live video on the App in a short distance. 3. Connect your mini spy camera to a 2.4G WiFi network, then you can remotely view live video on the App from anywhere.

Video Quality FHD 1080P View Angle 140 Degree Video Format MP4 Video Mode All-Day Video; Alarm Video; Timing Record; Privacy Mode; Loop Record Operation System Android & iPhone; Only Support View on the App; Don't RTSP Live Streaming or NVR Memory Card Up to 256GB Micro SD Card (NOT INCLUDED); Recommend Sandisk Brand with Class 10 and above

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Stealth and Quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm thoroughly impressed with the LIBREFLY Mini 1080P Hidden Spy Camera. The compact design makes it discreet yet powerful, and the 140-degree wide-angle lens captures every detail. The Wi-Fi connectivity enhances convenience for remote monitoring. Its USB charger disguise adds to the stealthiness, making it an excellent choice for home security. A highly recommended small nanny cam for its exceptional features, combining functionality and discretion seamlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with the Spy Cam!
reviews.reviewText: I like the LIBREFLY Mini 1080P Hidden Spy Camera. It's easy to install—just follow the instructions. It's small but powerful, and the wide-angle lens captures everything. You can even monitor remotely using Wi-Fi. Plus, it looks like a USB charger, so it's great for keeping our home safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the LIBREFLY Mini 1080P Hidden Spy Camera. Setup was actually easier than I thought it was going to be. Simply plug it in, download and configure the app per instruction and you're done! If you're looking for something affordable but definitely useful for keeping an eye on things, this is a great option.Motion detection and night vision worked great! It delivers high-resolution 1080P video. I have the app set up and you can do a lot of things there too. I have motion detection turned on to receive a notification once motion is detected. It works very well!You can view recordings live or view them later if they are saved on an SD card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We are happy to have purchased this product.
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to use, has incredible video quality, and is so discreet that you won't even notice it's there unless you're looking. The charger also works great and charges quickly without any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nifty Little Spycam
reviews.reviewText: The Good:The image quality and motion detection look and behave well. The camera's USB charger disguise is perfect. That you can use it as an actual charger is clever and totally sells the stealth aspect of the device.The Less Good:The HomeEye Android app is a little clunky and crashy. It's not bad enough to warrant returning it. With a little patience, one can set motion detection sensitivity and Alarm parameters. Since I am using this with a 25GB SD card, I am confident that I can get at the recordings regardless of the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints at all about this!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is highly recommended as it is easy to use, versatile and helps create a safer and more secure home environment. Nice little camera, easy to set up and good value for money. No complaints at all about this!

I recently purchased the LIBREFLY Hidden Camera Charger and have been thoroughly impressed with its performance. This small USB charger not only functions as a reliable charging device but also doubles as a discreet security camera. The setup was straightforward, and I was able to connect it to my WiFi without any hassle.The video quality is excellent, providing clear Full HD 1080P footage. It’s quite remarkable how this tiny gadget offers such crisp imagery. The wireless feature is particularly beneficial as it allows me to view the camera feed remotely on my phone, giving me peace of mind when I’m away from home.Its inconspicuous design is a major plus – it’s virtually undetectable as a camera, which makes it perfect for monitoring my space without drawing attention. I’ve used it to keep an eye on my pets and as a nanny cam, and it has worked flawlessly in both scenarios.Overall, I’m giving this product a solid 5 stars – it’s a fantastic tool for anyone looking to enhance their home security discreetly.

I purchased it due to good comments, because I needed the CAM to watch my toddler. I was not very sure about the quality first but after using it, I noticed that it's a very quality Cam. The video quality is good. App is easy to setup and you can watch live video and even record or download. I like the motion sensor recording. Which is very convenient and save a lot of storage. I suggest to go for this cam if you needed one and want a quality product. Also, it works exactly like a charger so no one will suspect it to be cam.

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera quality is surprisingly good for the size.
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality is surprisingly good for the size of this little unit, I cannot see the camera even when looking closely, if you shine a strong light directly at it you can see it but otherwise it's invisible. It connected to my network easily and I'm able to view the camera live with only a second.The video quality is excellent, providing clear Full HD 1080P footage. It features a 120-degree wide-angle lens, providing an extensive field of view and enhancing detail capture. The wireless feature is particularly beneficial as it allows me to view the camera feed remotely on my phone, giving me peace of mind when I’m away from home. It is the perfect hidden camera and looks completely like an adapter. Thanks to the user-friendly interface and excellent mobile app compatibility. Highly recommended!

This camera is excellent! It's compact and blends into the environment. The video quality is crystal-clear and the motion detection has worked perfectly!Setting up is also a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly interface and excellent mobile app compatibility. Highly recommended!

Simple setup, the instruction manual is very easy to follow, you can record videos to your phone without an SD card incase you don't have one. Video Quality needs some work, but overall very good & looks like an ordinary phone charger.
